title: The Ginger Survival Guide: Everything the Redhead Needs to Cope in a Cruel Gingerist World
description: The burden the modern redhead has to bear is heavy. Mocked by friends and foes alike, or worse, fetishized for their "red-hot" sex appeal, at times there may seem like no way out for our carrot-topped heroes. However, help is now at hand. This helpful guide supplies all the ammunition needed to complete the transformation from redhead whiner to Ginger Ninja!
author: Tim    Collins
